short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Alt Right isn't a movement. They are neo nazis and should be described as such.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The alt-right isn't a political movement, a set of views, or something worthy of equal and reasoned argument.  The alt-right seeks to suppress diversity, reduce the rights of American citizens, and spread hate. 

This extension replaces "alt-right" with "neo-nazi group" in your browser.

Let's call a spade a spade.  
And remember, love trumps hate.
